${modID}:OverclockPotion.NAME: Overclock Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b!P! cards. Fully charge all #yCharge cards. NL Can be used outside combat (draws only in combat).

${modID}:SpaghettiBrew.NAME: Spaghetti Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b!P! #yOrb slots. NL #yChannel a random #yOrb for each #yOrb slot you have.
